answer:
QUESTION

With respect to work, what should a person do if he feels under pressure (i.e. uneasy) at his work place due to the demands & responsibility of the particular job. Should he seek employment in another job? Is there some dua that can be recited for special help from Allah swt.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

Recite the following dua after each fard salah and as much as possible:

الهم اكفني لجلالك عن حرامك و اغنني بفضلك ممن سواك

Allahumma Akfinee Li Jalaalika An Haraamika Wa A’aninee Bi Fadlika Mim Man Siwaak
Oh Allah, Suffice me with you halal from you haram and make me rich and independent through Your grace and from besides You. 

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
